body_html: @fmassa is correct, those values are not representable in fp32. The issue is not with fp32 max value which is indeed 10^38, but with insufficient mantissa bits that cause some of the integers that are more than 2^24 not to be exactly representable, with gaps getting wider and wider for bigger numbers. So e.g. for 1.001e10 the closest representation is indeed 10010000384 (http://www.binaryconvert.com/result_float.html?decimal=049046048048049101049048)
